last_episode_to_air.name: Emperors Rule (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Po becomes head of Imperial Security when Lu Kang returns. Part 2 of 2.

name: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
original_name: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
overview: A martial-arts loving panda gets help from his mentor and friends as he becomes a warrior and protects the valley where he lives.

episodes.name: Scorpion's Sting
episodes.overview: Po and Monkey race to find a sacred orchid to cure a sick Tigress. But Monkey is hypnotized by the evil Scorpion into hunting down another target -- Po.

episodes.name: The Princess and the Po
episodes.overview: Po is put in charge of protecting the Emperor’s daughter while on a diplomatic trip to visit the Qidan clan. Luckily, Tigress and Mantis are along for the journey.

episodes.name: Sticky Situation
episodes.overview: Po destroys the training hall whilst cleaning it and needs to repair it quickly before Shifu finds out. He seeks out the builder of the hall, Taotie, who holds a grudge against Shifu.

episodes.name: Chain Reaction
episodes.overview: While transporting an important column, Po and Tigress’s attempt to defend it against bandits is complicated when they are chained together.

episodes.name: Fluttering Finger Mindslip
episodes.overview: Po learns a new move by jumping ahead of reading fifty sacred scrolls and ends up wiping the memories of the Furious Five.

episodes.name: Good Croc, Bad Croc
episodes.overview: Po is tricked into saving the leader of the Croc Bandits’ brother when in fact he has kidnapped the son of a powerful landowner.

episodes.name: Hometown Hero
episodes.overview: Mantis gets help from Po after receiving word his ex-fiancée needs help, which he is reluctant to take as his hometown believes Mantis to be the Dragon Warrior.

episodes.name: Jailhouse Panda
episodes.overview: Po goes undercover as a prisoner in Chor Ghom Prison to learn where a diabolical criminal has hidden the ultra-dangerous weapon, the Sacred War Hammer of Lei Lang.

episodes.name: Owl Be Back
episodes.overview: The Furious Five discover that Po has incredible kung fu abilities far beyond anyone else’s in the group. This worries them as they believe he will turn evil like Fenghuang, a member of the Furious Five before the current team who was also greatly powerful.

episodes.name: Bad Po
episodes.overview: Po has split himself into two opposing parts by looking through the Mystic Mirror of Yin and Yang and needs to stop his duplicate from destroying his reputation and friendships with his bad personality traits.

episodes.name: Sight for Sore Eyes
episodes.overview: When a villainous rival of Master Shifu manipulates Po into breaking an important rule, the consequences allow him to become Grand Master of the Jade Palace.

episodes.name: Rhino's Revenge
episodes.overview: Hundun, a former guard at Chor Ghom prison, wants revenge against the Dragon Warrior for making him lose everything in his life as a result of defeating Tai Lung.

episodes.name: Master Ping
episodes.overview: Shifu invites Mr. Ping to stay at the Jade Palace when his noodle shop is badly damaged during a fight between Po, Monkey and three pig brothers. This causes tension between him and the others until he is asked to leave and is subsequently captured by the pig brothers believing him to be Master Shifu.

episodes.name: Ghost of Oogway
episodes.overview: Po encounters the ghost of Master Oogway, who seems strangely bent on causing dissension in the Jade Palace.

episodes.name: The Kung Fu Kid
episodes.overview: When a kung fu prodigy arrives at the Jade Palace, Po’s enthusiasm begins to sour when he gets a little jealous of the attention being heaped onto the young master.

episodes.name: Ladies of the Shade
episodes.overview: Po befriends a troupe of dancers, unaware that they are actually a band of traveling thieves. When a prized item goes missing from the Jade Palace, Po has to disguise himself to infiltrate the band.

episodes.name: Big Bro Po
episodes.overview: Po must look after Taotie's son after he is taken to prison after a failed attack on the Jade Palace. His loyalties are split when he tries to help his father get out of prison though he has warmed to Po.

episodes.name: Po Fans Out
episodes.overview: Po finds he has a fan club in the valley but they are unimpressed when they find the Dragon Warrior's day to day life isn't as action packed as they imagined. With this newfound attention flagging, Po releases a demon in order to fight it and impress his fan club.

episodes.name: Challenge Day
episodes.overview: It's Dragon Warrior Challenge Day, and if anyone can defeat Po in battle before sundown, they will become the Dragon Warrior.

episodes.name: My Favorite Yao
episodes.overview: Shifu's personal hero arrives at the Jade Palace, but in his overenthusiasm, Shifu accidentally lets him run amok while Temutai schemes to abduct him.

episodes.name: In With the Old
episodes.overview: When the Furious Five go out of town and the Jade Palace is attacked, Po has to rely on a team of elderly Mahjong players for back-up.

episodes.name: Has-Been Hero
episodes.overview: Po's kung fu hero comes to town for an exhibition match.

episodes.name: Love Stings
episodes.overview: Po sets up his father, Mr. Ping, on a series of unsuccessful dates, only to find out Mr. Ping already has a girlfriend. Po's happiness for his dad is short lived when he finds out the mystery lady's identity.

episodes.name: Hall of Lame
episodes.overview: Po needs to find an awesome Dragon Warrior trophy for the Hall of Heroes or be humiliated in front of the entire village at the upcoming Warrior Festival.

episodes.name: Father Crime
episodes.overview: When Shifu's con-man father comes back into town, Po finds himself in the middle.

episodes.name: Monkey in the Middle
episodes.overview: The villagers are outraged over a rash of thefts in the Valley of Peace.

episodes.name: Kung Fu Day Care
episodes.overview: Tigress must babysit a child who has been separated from his parents. The Croc Bandits are trying to kidnap him for a ransom.

episodes.name: Royal Pain
episodes.overview: Master Shifu and the Furious Five meet their newest trainee – The Emperor's Grandson!

episodes.name: The Most Dangerous Po
episodes.overview: While visiting a famous war hero named General Tsin, Po discovers that the retired general has lost his mind.

episodes.name: The Po Who Cried Ghost
episodes.overview: Po comes face to face with hopping ghosts called Jiang Shi which have been sighted around the Valley of Peace's cemetery.

episodes.name: Kung Shoes
episodes.overview: Po buys shoes that promise to make him better at Kung Fu without the training, but the shoes were created with evil magic and threaten the Furious Five.

episodes.name: Bosom Enemies
episodes.overview: After being defeated by Po, Taotie has a nervous breakdown.

episodes.name: Enter the Dragon (1)
episodes.overview: Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu. Part 1 of 2.

episodes.name: Enter the Dragon (2)
episodes.overview: Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu. Part 2 of 2.

episodes.name: Master and the Panda
episodes.overview: Po's the only one unhappy when Peng returns to town, because Po knows who Peng's uncle is.

episodes.name: Present Tense
episodes.overview: Po takes a job as a bounty hunter to earn money to buy his father a gift.

episodes.name: Shifu's Back!
episodes.overview: Po must sit in as master of the Jade Palace when Shifu hurts his back.

episodes.name: Terror Cotta
episodes.overview: Fung finds an old scroll with instructions for making living terra cotta warriors, and soon it's up to Po and the Furious Five to stop his monstrous clay creations.

episodes.name: The Spirit Orbs of Master Ding
episodes.overview: When Po is possessed by the ghost of the evil Master Ding, it's up to Tigress to save him before Ding can unleash his powers and enslave the Valley of Peace.

episodes.name: The Maltese Mantis
episodes.overview: Po and Mantis visit the equivalent of an ancient Chinese Comic-Con, where Po’s fanboy enthusiasm gets out of hand.

episodes.name: Invitation Only
episodes.overview: Po is sad when he learns that everyone has been invited to a dinner party except for him, due to his poor table manners. Will Shifu be able to teach Po proper etiquette AND foil the attack of the evil Temutai and his army?

episodes.name: The Midnight Stranger
episodes.overview: When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

episodes.name: Shoot the Messenger
episodes.overview: Po and Tigress must track down and stop a messenger from delivering a scroll that could thrust China into all-out war!

episodes.name: A Tigress Tale
episodes.overview: When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace decides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

episodes.name: Crane on a Wire
episodes.overview: Po tries to help Crane get his "mojo" back after he is humiliated at a charity event.

episodes.name: The Secret Museum of Kung Fu
episodes.overview: With Po and the Furious Five at each other's throats, Shifu takes them all on a disastrous road trip.

episodes.name: Bride of Po
episodes.overview: Po saves a girl from some bandits, only to learn that she's engaged to be married to the Dragon Warrior.

episodes.name: Five is Enough
episodes.overview: Master Chao visits the valley to oversee a Tournament. Shifu is convinced that Po and Master Chao want to replace him. Shifu's old enemy, Pai Mei, arrives in the middle of the tournament and threatens to destroy Shifu.

episodes.name: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu
episodes.overview: When Crane's mother visits the Valley of Peace, Crane asks his friends to help him keep a secret from her.

episodes.name: Secret Admirer
episodes.overview: Po plays a prank on Monkey with a fake love letter and their relationship is tested.

episodes.name: Qilin Time
episodes.overview: After his father takes him on a wild goose chase, Po becomes embarrassed.

episodes.name: Huge
episodes.overview: Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge and inadvertently puts himself and his friends in danger.

episodes.name: Shifu's Ex
episodes.overview: When Shifu's thieving ex-girlfriend visits the Jade Palace seeking redemption, Shifu quickly learns she wants more than simple forgiveness.

episodes.name: War of the Noodles
episodes.overview: Hundun opens up a noodle shop in the village, threatening to put Mr. Ping out of business.

episodes.name: The Break Up
episodes.overview: Po and Mr. Ping must make things right when two Croc Bandits have a spat.

episodes.name: Mind Over Manners
episodes.overview: Po is struck by lightning which gives him the power to read minds.

episodes.name: A Thousand and Twenty Questions
episodes.overview: Master Yao announces that anyone who brings him a new wonder will be allowed to ask him a single question.

episodes.name: The Way of the Prawn
episodes.overview: Despite Po's objections, Shifu calls in a samurai prawn to help take down a villain from Japan.

episodes.name: Mouth Off
episodes.overview: Shifu suggests that Po should take a vow of silence to help with his focus.

episodes.name: Serpent's Tooth
episodes.overview: The villagers begin to adopt an anti-snake sentiment when Fu-xi turns renegade and attacks the Valley of Peace.

episodes.name: The Goosefather
episodes.overview: The local thugs love Mr. Ping's soup so much, the noodle shop becomes a villain hangout.

episodes.name: Po Picks a Pocket
episodes.overview: Po befriends a group of orphans who have been stealing money and goods from the villagers.

episodes.name: Croc You Like a Hurricane
episodes.overview: Fed up with his constant complaining, Shifu puts lazy Po in charge of training the Furious Five. Things go from bad to worse when the Croc Bandits receive training from a mysterious kung fu master and become the new heroes of the Valley of Peace.

episodes.name: Crazy Little Ling Called Love
episodes.overview: Po is suspicious when Shifu gets back together with his evil ex-girlfriend, Mei Ling.

episodes.name: Kung Fu Club
episodes.overview: Shifu sends Po to shut down an underground fight club.

episodes.name: The Hunger Game
episodes.overview: Po and the Five must stop food-stealing rats to end a famine, but Po's weakness for food may hinder the mission.

episodes.name: A Stitch in Time
episodes.overview: Po discovers the seeds of Shuyong: magical items that can actually take the user back in time. After Po disobeys Shifu, evil Fenghuang steals one of the seeds, putting the entire world in danger.

episodes.name: Eternal Chord
episodes.overview: Po's qi is out of balance, and Shifu and wise Master Lun attempt to re-harmonize the panda using the ancient tradition of musical kung fu.

episodes.name: Apocalypse Yao
episodes.overview: Mystic secrets are stolen from Master Yao's head, so the master turns to Po for help.

episodes.name: The Real Dragon Warrior
episodes.overview: Po and Monkey discover a small village and meet an impostor claiming to be the Dragon Warrior.

episodes.name: Youth in Re-Volt
episodes.overview: Bian Zao steals magical lightning powers.

episodes.name: Forsaken and Furious
episodes.overview: The furious five quit the Jade Palace and head out on their own.

episodes.name: Po the Croc
episodes.overview: Po is left with amnesia after a blow to the head.

episodes.name: Camp Ping
episodes.overview: Shifu and Mr. Ping compete for Po's attention.

episodes.name: Goose Chase
episodes.overview: Zeng unhappily quits his job at the Palace.

episodes.name: The First Five
episodes.overview: Po hosts a reunion for the First Furious Five, and Shifu's heroic legacy is questioned at the gathering.

episodes.name: See No Weevil
episodes.overview: General Tsin has a conspiracy theory about alien rice weevils taking over the world.

episodes.name: Emperors Rule (1)
episodes.overview: Po becomes head of Imperial Security when Lu Kang returns. Part 1 of 2.

episodes.name: Emperors Rule (2)
episodes.overview: Po becomes head of Imperial Security when Lu Kang returns. Part 2 of 2.
